CustomField.description: Look at the Priority of the disruption preference, multiply it by 100 000 000 and add the number of the case. Then you have a number that we will use to filter data: If you filter asc, you will get first cases related to the Number 1 priority (by order of creation date, thanks to the case number), then all cases related to the Number 2 priority (by order of date), etc...
CustomField.label: Disruption Priority
